articles.title: Ipsen snags an approved cancer drug in $247M M&A deal as another battered biotech sells cheap - Endpoints News
articles.description: You can add Paris-based Ipsen to the list of discount buyers patrolling the penny stock pack for a cheap M&A deal. The French biotech, which has had plenty of its own problems to grapple with, has swooped in to buy Epizyme $EPZM for $247 million in cash and a…
